queryName: Audit log maxbackup not properly set
descriptionText: When a container or initContainer runs `kube-apiserver`, the `--audit-log-maxbackup` flag should be set to 10 or more. The rule reports a MissingAttribute when the flag is not defined and an IncorrectValue when the flag is defined with a value less than 10. Setting the flag to at least 10 helps retain rotated audit logs for a longer period.
